name: Verify that a new page is opened when the apply link of a job is clicked -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I am on the Career landing page
When I click on the dropdown and select "HR department"
Then I should see job items listed under the "HR department"
And I click the Apply button for the "HR Manager" job
Then I should see a new page for filling job application details

fullName: TC_97 - Verify the Apply link for a HR Manager job in the HR Department: Verify that a new page is opened when the apply link of a job is clicked

labels.name: feature
labels.value: TC_97 - Verify the Apply link for a HR Manager job in the HR Department
